column2: Reason is respected by other non-religious people. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.

Non-religious rulers can liberate territory from the rule of religious ones. Nearby religious rulers will likely join in the defence. Conquered lands will be distributed to claimants and those who contributed most to the war. (Same as a crusade)
This character is an atheist, but is not open about their lack of belief
The character lacks a belief in any gods, but is not open about it. Gain Closeted Atheist trait.
The character renounces religion and openly identifies as secular. This will convert the character to the None religion.
Host a Reason Rally in your capital to promote freethinking and secularism.
